CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 挑战；考验；质疑；免疫反应的刺激；免疫系统与病原体的接触；口令盘问；暗号盘问；反对；诘问；辩驳；对抗；竞争
质疑；怀疑；对…怀疑；挑战；邀请参加比赛；拒绝接受；对抗；提出异议；（尤指在对方不情愿时）强烈建议（某人做某事）；考验…的技巧；考查…的能力

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 挑战的；引起挑战性兴趣的
要求；质疑；反对；向…挑战；盘问（challenge的ing形式）

word_group.brief_definition: 迎接挑战；应付挑战；应对挑战
巨大挑战；难以应付的挑战
独特挑战；特殊挑战；特有的挑战

bilingual.target: “好了，注意听。今天是诗歌挑战日！”

bilingual.source: My biggest challenge is learning how to behave at the dinner table.
bilingual.target: 我最大的挑战是学习餐桌礼仪。

bilingual.source: What advice would you give to someone facing the same challenge?
bilingual.target: 你会给面临同样挑战的人什么建议？

bilingual.source: One of the main reasons is that people want to challenge themselves.
bilingual.target: 主要原因之一是人们想挑战自己。

bilingual.source: Finding and keeping the right balance can be a big challenge.
bilingual.target: 找到并保持正确的平衡可能是一个巨大的挑战。

bilingual.source: Festivals are a challenge because our patients are often in a bad situation.
bilingual.target: 节日是一个挑战，因为我们的病人往往情况不好。

bilingual.source: If you enjoy a challenge, then come and join the expedition to Mount Everest!
bilingual.target: 如果你喜欢挑战，那就来加入珠穆朗玛峰探险吧！

bilingual.source: As a computer engineer, there's always a new challenge just around the corner!
bilingual.target: 作为一名计算机工程师，总是有新的挑战在眼前！

list.abstract: challenge（[ˈtʃælɪndʒ]），英语单词，作名词用，为挑战；异议；质疑。作动词用，为反对；向…盘问口令；与…竞争。短语搭配有face challenge（面临挑战），例句为“It poses a challenge to seniors.（这对大四学生来说是个挑战。）” challenge名词类近义词有dare、doubt。challenge形容词形式为challenging、challengeable，名词形式为challenger，复数为challenges。
Challenge，是阿迪达斯（Adidas）公司的一个乒乓球底板系列，包括有Challenge Light, Challenge Force和Challenge Speed三款底板。

yingyinNormal.en: This is a challenge I take personally.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这对于我来说是一个挑战。

yingyinNormal.en: That's fine. Sounds like a fun challenge.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没问题。听上去是个有趣的挑战。

yingyinNormal.en: You can challenge stereotypes, both subtle and obvious.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们可以挑战老一套的做法。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《Facebook COO谢丽尔·桑德伯格哈佛演讲》

yingyinNormal.en: I could use a challenge. It's getting pretty easy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我可以接受挑战，那应该会很容易。

yingyinNormal.en: Now SpaceX is tackling an even greater challenge.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在SpaceX正在应对更大的挑战。

yingyinNormal.en: Why was that necessary? Why did my brother challenge me?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我为何需要那样？我的亲兄弟为何要来挑战我？

yingyinNormal.en: John Sculley? President of Pepsi Cola. The Pepsi Challenge guy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 约翰 斯卡利，百事可乐的总裁。那个“百事挑战”家伙

yingyinNormal.en: How many guesses do you get? Six. Challenge extended. Deal. Challenge excepted.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们能猜几次？六次。男生队下战书。赌就赌。女生队接受挑战。

yingyinNormal.en: Cowards, all of you! None of you rise to meet my challenge?
yingyinNormal.zh: 懦夫，你们全都是懦夫。你们谁都不敢和我挑战？

yingyinNormal.en: You want a real challenge, try keeping me from eating more of these.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你想来个真正的挑战吗，试试阻止我继续吃牛角包啊。

yingyinNormal.en: Now it is a challenge out there today, I know, but I wanna share something with you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我知道，今天的确是个挑战，但我会给你回报的。

yingyinNormal.en: Because meeting a public health challenge like this isn't just a job for government.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因为应对一个像这样的公共卫生挑战，不仅仅是政府的工作。

yingyinNormal.en: I accept your challenge, if only to personally ripped the heart out of your pathetic body.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果只是私人的，我接受你的挑战，我将撕开你可怜的身体，取出你的心脏。

yingyinNormal.en: And that's the spirit all of us can draw upon as Americans, as we meet this challenge together.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这正是我们所有人作为美国人在我们一起团结应对这一挑战时可以依靠的精神。

yingyinNormal.en: Now, here's the challenge. In order to feed us, every one of these outlets has to be supplied with food.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在挑战来了，为了养活全美国的人，每一间这类的商店都必须提供食物。

yingyinNormal.en: Beyond the Wormhole, the crew will face a far greater challenge: To navigate the perils of a black hole.
yingyinNormal.zh: 超越了虫洞，宇航员将会面临艰巨得多的挑战：航行于黑洞的极大危险中.

yingyinNormal.en: And when I thought about my challenge, balancing risk and reward, I realized that risk and reward naturally go together.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当我考虑到自己的挑战，平衡风险和回报时，我意识到风险和回报是共存的。

yingyinNormal.en: That's hard enough, but there's an even bigger challenge, how to keep it constantly supplied with electricity nationwide.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那已经是艰巨的任务，但还有更大的挑战，怎么保证电流畅通保证全国的供电。

yingyinNormal.en: But the really interesting technical challenge for people here is, you know, every facebook experience is totally unique.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但这技术上的挑战对人们来说十分新奇，每一个脸书得到的经验都如此与众不同。

yingyinNormal.en: You think this is clever? Well, you know, they only give you three letters, so after A-S-S it is a bit of a challenge.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你觉得那么做很聪明？我只能写下三个字母，除了屁股外，其他的名字可是个大挑战。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: invite to engage in a contest

examination_example.sentence: Forests give us shade, quiet and one of the harder <highlight>challenges</highlight> in the fight against climate change.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 森林给予我们阴凉和宁静，也在气候变化斗争方面给了我们一项更严峻的挑战。

examination_example.sentence: While all of these countries face their own <highlight>challenges</highlight>, there are a number of consistent themes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然所有这些国家都面临着各自的挑战，但也有一些一致的主题。

examination_example.sentence: We might then begin to solve our immigration <highlight>challenges</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们可能会开始解决我们的移民挑战。

sense_info_list.en: dispute the truth or validity of

examination_example.sentence: At least a dozen industry groups, four states, and three environmental groups are <highlight>challenging</highlight> it in federal court.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 至少有十几个行业组织、四个州和三个环保组织在联邦法院对此提出质疑。

examination_example.sentence: Scientific claims will survive <highlight>challenges</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 科学主张将经受质疑。

examination_example.sentence: Newly published discovery claims and credible discoveries that appear to be important and convincing will always be open to <highlight>challenge</highlight> by future researchers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 新发表的那些发现声明，以及看似重要且有说服力的可信发现，总是会受到后来研究者的挑战。

sense_info_list.en: to test sb's ability and skills, especially in an interesting way

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: invite to engage in a contest

examination_example.sentence: These studies are confirming, <highlight>challenging</highlight> and extending what's been found using more traditional approaches.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些研究正在证实，挑战和扩展使用传统的方法发现的结果。

examination_example.sentence: For many of the researchers who'd like to design systems to address these <highlight>challenges</highlight>, massive database for experimentation just don't exist.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对于希望能设计系统来解决这些难题的研究者来说，他们面对的问题是能够用来实验的大型数据集根本不存在。

examination_example.sentence: A disappointing holiday season performance capped a difficult year for department store chain facing wide-ranging <highlight>challenges</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 令人失望的假日季表现使这家百货连锁店陷入了艰难的一年，面临广泛的挑战。

examination_example.sentence: Those simultaneous <highlight>challenges</highlight> appear less overwhelming with increasingly better answers to a centuries-old question; how to make power portable.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从古至今，人们一直在探索如何让电力便携化。如今，人们找到了回答这一问题的更好的答案，那些伴随新技术发展而来的诸多挑战也就没那么严峻了。

sense_info_list.en: dispute the truth or validity of

examination_example.sentence: The findings <highlight>challenged</highlight> the idea that homework was "inherently good."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些发现质疑了家庭作业“本质上是好的”的观点。

sense_info_list.en: tell someone at a border or gate to stand still and say their name and reasons for being there
an invitation to compete or take part, especially in a game or argument

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: invite to engage in a contest

examination_example.sentence: These are processes that you are developing so that you are able, over time, to tackle more interesting problems, more <highlight>challenging</highlight> problems — problems that require many people instead of one person, and many skills instead of one.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种实践都是你逐渐展开的过程，久而久之你就能够处理更有趣以及更具挑战性的问题——这是问题需要多人合力，而非某个人的一己之力来解决。

examination_example.sentence: Traditional CBT is considered an effective form of talk therapy for depression, helping people <highlight>challenge</highlight> negative thoughts and change the way they think in order to change their mood and behaviors.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 传统的认知行为疗法(CBT)是有效治疗抑郁症的一种谈话疗法，帮助患者与消极思维作斗争，改变他们的思维方式，从而改善情绪和行为方式。

examination_example.sentence: Around 1804, Talleyrand <highlight>challenged</highlight> Carmela to produce a full menu for his personal castle, instructing the young baker to use local, seasonal fruits and vegetables and to avoid repeating main dishes over the course of an entire year.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 1804年左右，Talleyrand给了Carmela一个挑战，为他的个人城堡制作一份完整的菜单，指示这名年轻的面包师使用当地的时令水果和蔬菜，并避免在一整年中重复主菜。

examination_example.sentence: Is it possible to enjoy a peaceful life in a world that is increasingly <highlight>challenged</highlight> by threats.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在这个日益受到威胁挑战的世界中，是否有可能享受平静的生活。

sense_info_list.en: dispute the truth or validity of

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: invite to engage in a contest

examination_example.sentence: With her five-day <highlight>challenge</highlight> courses, she helps them get over the fear.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通过为期五天的挑战课程，她帮助他们克服恐惧。

examination_example.sentence: We stop <highlight>challenging</highlight> custom.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们停止挑战习俗。

examination_example.sentence: The environmental <highlight>challenges</highlight> are significant but the efforts made by the Tanzania National Park Authority seem to be paying off .
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然说环境挑战任重道远，不过这样看来坦桑尼亚国家公园管理局做出的努力还是初见成效了。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Don’t forget to forgive yourself: For some people, forgiving themselves is the biggest <highlight>challenge</highlight>!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 别忘了原谅自己:对有些人来说，原谅自己是最大的挑战！

examination_example.sentence: As a man of 93, he met a <highlight>challenge</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 作为一个93岁的老人，他遇到了挑战。

examination_example.sentence: But the boy took that as a <highlight>challenge</highlight>(挑战).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是这个男孩把这当成了一个挑战.

examination_example.sentence: You have to increase the willpower to <highlight>challenge</highlight> your own favorites.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你得增加意志力来挑战自己的最爱。

examination_example.sentence: He <highlight>challenged</highlight> people to go on microadventures and send him four-minute videos of their trips.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他邀请人们参加微探险，并给他发送四分钟的旅行视频。

examination_example.sentence: She planned to <highlight>challenge</highlight> more new things outside volleyball in the future.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她计划将来挑战更多排球之外的新事物。
